verses.verse: <S%G2236>Now<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> That the <S%G2818>heir,<s%> as <S%G5550>long<s%> as he is a <S%G3516>child,<s%> <S%G1308>differs<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> from a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> though he be <S%G2962>lord<s%> of <S%G3956>all;<s%>
But is <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2012>tutors<s%> and <S%G3623>governors<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4287>time<s%> <S%G4287>appointed<s%> of the <S%G3962>father.<s%>
<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> we, <S%G3753>when<s%> we were <S%G3516>children,<s%> were in <S%G1402>bondage<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G4747>elements<s%> of the <S%G2889>world:<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of the <S%G5550>time<s%> was <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> of a <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%>
To <S%G1805>redeem<s%> them that were <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> that we might <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G5206>adoption<s%> of <S%G5206>sons.<s%>

And <S%G3754>because<s%> you are <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G2896>crying,<s%> <S%G5>Abba,<s%> <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> but a <S%G5207>son;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> an <S%G2818>heir<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G235>However,<s%> <S%G5119>then,<s%> when you <S%G1492>knew<s%> not <S%G2316>God,<s%> you did <S%G1398>service<s%> to them which by <S%G5449>nature<s%> are <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2316>gods.<s%>

But <S%G3568>now,<s%> after that you have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> are <S%G1097>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1994>turn<s%> you <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G772>weak<s%> and <S%G4434>beggarly<s%> <S%G4747>elements,<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> you <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G509><s%> to be in <S%G1398>bondage?<s%>
You <S%G3906>observe<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G3376>months,<s%> and <S%G2540>times,<s%> and <S%G1763>years.<s%>
I am <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of you, <S%G3381>lest<s%> I have <S%G2872>bestowed<s%> on you <S%G2872>labor<s%> in <S%G1500>vain.<s%>
<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> you, be as I am; for I am as you are: you have not <S%G91>injured<s%> me <S%G3762>at<s%> <S%G3762>all.<s%>
You <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G769>infirmity<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you at the <S%G4386>first.<s%>

And my <S%G3986>temptation<s%> which was in my <S%G4561>flesh<s%> you <S%G1848>despised<s%> not, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1609>rejected;<s%> but <S%G1209>received<s%> me as an <S%G32>angel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> even as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G5101>Where<s%> is <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G3108>blessedness<s%> you spoke of? for I <S%G3140>bear<s%> you <S%G3140>record,<s%> that, <S%G1487>if<s%> it had been <S%G1415>possible,<s%> you would have <S%G1846>plucked<s%> out <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and have <S%G1325>given<s%> them to me.
Am I <S%G5620>therefore<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemy,<s%> because I <S%G226>tell<s%> you the <S%G226>truth?<s%>
They <S%G2206>zealously<s%> <S%G2206>affect<s%> you, but not <S%G2573>well;<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> they <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G1576>exclude<s%> you, that you might <S%G2206>affect<s%> them.

But it is <S%G2570>good<s%> to be <S%G2206>zealously<s%> <S%G2206>affected<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> in a <S%G2570>good<s%> thing, and not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> I am <S%G3918>present<s%> with you.
My <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G5605>travail<s%> in <S%G5605>birth<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3445>formed<s%> in you,
I <S%G2309>desire<s%> to be <S%G3918>present<s%> with you <S%G737>now,<s%> and to <S%G236>change<s%> my <S%G5456>voice;<s%> for I <S%G639>stand<s%> in <S%G639>doubt<s%> of you.
<S%G3004>Tell<s%> me, you that <S%G2309>desire<s%> to be <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> do you not <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3551>law?<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons,<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> by a female <S%G3814>slave,<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> by a free <S%G1658>woman.<s%>
But he who was of the female <S%G3814>slave<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> but he of the free <S%G1658>woman<s%> was by <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

<S%G3748>Which<s%> things are an <S%G238>allegory:<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> are the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1242>covenants;<s%> the <S%G3391>one<s%> from the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai,<s%> which <S%G1080>engenders<s%> to <S%G1397>bondage,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G28>Agar.<s%>

For <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G28>Agar<s%> is <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai<s%> in <S%G688>Arabia,<s%> and <S%G4960>answers<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is, and is in <S%G1398>bondage<s%> with her <S%G5043>children.<s%>
But <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> which is <S%G507>above<s%> is <S%G1658>free,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of us <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2165>Rejoice,<s%> you <S%G4723>barren<s%> that <S%G5088>bore<s%> not; <S%G4486>break<s%> <S%G4486>forth<s%> and <S%G994>cry,<s%> you that <S%G5605>travail<s%> not: for the <S%G2048>desolate<s%> has <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> she which <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G435>husband.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> we, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> as <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> was, are the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

But as <S%G5119>then<s%> he that was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> him that was born <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it is <S%G3568>now.<s%>

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture?<s%> <S%G1544>Cast<s%> out the female <S%G3814>slave<s%> and her <S%G5207>son:<s%> for the <S%G5207>son<s%> of the female <S%G3814>slave<s%> shall not be <S%G2816>heir<s%> with the <S%G5207>son<s%> of the free <S%G1658>woman.<s%>
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> we are not <S%G5043>children<s%> of the female <S%G3814>slave,<s%> but of the <S%G1658>free.<s%>
